title: The Best of Patreon: November 2021
description:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of November.
In this peek, you'll hear us giving a listener some advice in our Dear Sinister advice segment; debating the merits of lateness on Unpopular Opinions; answering a question on Britney Spears's newfound freedom during the Q&A; debating various pizza temperatures in Unpopular Opinions live; and, revisiting the topic of Annabelle the Doll for our minisode.
To hear full episodes, see all the videos, and for details on all the benefits, head over to patreon.com/sinisterhood to subscribe today!

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
If you aren't subscribed to our Patreon, we wanted to give you a glimpse of what we've got going on. This mega-mix of clips brings you some of our favorite segments from the month of November.

In this peek, you'll hear us giving a listener some advice in our Dear Sinister advice segment; debating the merits of lateness on Unpopular Opinions; answering a question on Britney Spears's newfound freedom during the Q&A; debating various pizza temperatures in Unpopular Opinions live; and, revisiting the topic of Annabelle the Doll for our minisode.

To hear full episodes, see all the videos, and for details on all the benefits, head over to patreon.com/sinisterhood to subscribe today!
